alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:27PM MDT until July 13 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Hamlin County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pelican Lake, or near Watertown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Castlewood around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Claremont Colony, Bemis, Poinsett Colony and Clear Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
